msContents.summary: This is a multiple text manuscript. It has two texts. First one is Gautama Dharmasūtra and second is Gṛhyapariśiṣṭa.

msItem.title: Gautama Dharmasūtra
msItem.author: Gautama

filiation.p: VOHD II,6 p 723, entry 2066 New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 06 pp: 226-228

msItem.incipit: t1-1v 1 vedo dharmamūlam | tadvidāṃ ca smṛtiśīle | dṛṣṭo dharmavyatikramaḥ sāhasaṃ ca mahatāṃ | avaradaurbalyāt | tulyabalavirodhe vikalpaḥ | upanayanaṃ brāhmaṇasyāṣṭame | t1-1v 2 navame pañcame vā kāmyam | garbhādiḥ saṅkhyā varṣāṇām | taddvitīyaṃ janma | tad yasmāt sa ācāryaḥ | vedānuvacanāc ca | ekādaśadvādaśayoḥ kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ | ā ṣoḍa t1-1v 3 śād brāhmaṇasyāpatitā sāvitrī | dvāviṃśate rājanyasya | dvyadhikāyāvaiśyasya |
msItem.explicit: t1-19r 1 vipratipattau yad āha | yato 'yam aprabhavo bhūtānāṃ hiṃsānugrahayogeṣu | dharmiṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa svargaṃ lokaṃ dharmavid āpnotijñānābhiniveśābhyām | iti dharmo t1-19r 2 dharmaḥ | 29 t1-19r 3 pratyuṣe karmmakadaṃbāḥ pradoṣe makaraṃ yadi saṃkramet ṣaṣṭināḍyastu puṇyāḥ pūrvottarāstutāḥ ..

msItem.title: Gṛhyapariśiṣṭaṃ

filiation.p: VOHD II,6 p 700, entry 2018 New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 06 p: 104

msItem.incipit: t2-1v 1 athātaśśaucavidhī vyākhyāsyāmo grāmāṃ naiṛtyāmadūrataraṃ gatvā yajñopavitaṃ śirasi dakṣiṇe karṇe vā kutvā mṛttikāṃ gṛṇhāti kāṣṭhāmantaṃ t2-1v 2 rdhvoyaṃ upaviśedahantyuttarato niśāyāndakṣiṇata ubhayossajyayoru darbhamukhaḥ nāntānā potato vṛkṣamūle catuṣpathenyāgāre gavā t2-1v 3 ṃ goṣṭhendahanapūrve navajaṃ devagrahephalake muṣikasthale pratyatiṃ pratisūryyanca pratigrahaṃ pratibrāhmaṇamityāha bhagavānrāṇā t2-1v 4 yaniḥ t2-30v 3 t . tathāpi sīmantamapi prasiddhaṃ vadanti vahnerhahibhāga ṣaṣṭhaḥ . 37 . iti gṛhyapariśiṣṭe dvitīyaprapāṭhake prathamaḥ khaṇḍaḥ .
msItem.explicit: t2-32r 4 kṛṣṇāṃgārāha bhaveścāgaṃ kerubhyo kubjarameteṣām abhāve sarvebhyo hiraṇyaṃ āvāhanamantreṇa visarjanaṃ sarveṣāṃ kuryāt nigadava t 2-32r 5 rjaṃ evaṃ khate vipulā ca lakṣmīrbhavati lakṣmīrbhavatītyāha bhagavān vāmanaḥ . athātoṅkurārpaṇavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ pu
